<<<<<<< HEAD
The real presence and spirituall of Christ in the blessed sacrament proved against the doctrine of transubstantiation. By Jer. Taylor, D.D. Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.
[16], 347, [5] p.
Printed by James Flesher for Richard Royston at the Angel in Ivie-lane, London : 1654. [i.e. 1653]
Running title reads: Of the real presence of Christ in the holy sacrament. With two final advertisement leaves. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nou. 21 1653"; the 4 in the imprint date has been crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Running title reads: Of the real presence of Christ in the holy sacrament. With two final advertisement leaves. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nou. 21 1653"; the 4 in the imprint date has been crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
